    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <string.h>

    long long compute_gcd(long long a, long long b) {
        while (b != 0) {
            long long temp = b;
            b = a % b;
            a = temp;
        }
        return a;
    }

    int main() {
        long long n, m;
        char s[100000], t[100000];
        scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &m);
        scanf("%s %s", s, t);

        long long gcd_val = compute_gcd(n, m);
        int flag = 1;
        for (int k = 0; k < gcd_val; k++) {
            long long pos_s = (k * n) / gcd_val;
            long long pos_t = (k * m) / gcd_val;
            if (s[pos_s] != t[pos_t]) {
                flag = 0;
                break;
            }
        }

        long long res;
        if (!flag) {
            res = -1;
        } else {
            res = (n * m) / gcd_val;
        }

        // Now process the second part
        if (res == -1) {
            printf("-1\n");
            return 0;
        }

        // Convert res to string
        char number_str[25];
        snprintf(number_str, sizeof(number_str), "%lld", res);
        int len = strlen(number_str);

        // Process the second part's logic
        int digits[len + 1];
        for (int i = 0; i <= len; i++) {
            digits[i] = 0;
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
            digits[i] = number_str[len - 1 - i] - '0';
        }

        int bills = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i <= len; i++) {
            if (digits[i] == 10) {
                digits[i + 1]++;
                digits[i] = 0;
            }

            if (digits[i] < 5) {
                bills += digits[i];
            } else if (digits[i] == 5) {
                if (digits[i + 1] >= 5) {
                    digits[i + 1]++;
                }
                bills += 5;
            } else {
                digits[i + 1]++;
                bills += 10 - digits[i];
            }
        }

        printf("%d\n", bills);

        return 0;
    }
